paper_abstract: The d-dimensional simplicial, terminal, and reflexive polytopes with at least 3d-2 vertices are classified. In particular, it turns out that all of them are smooth Fano polytopes. This improves on previous results of Casagrande (Ann Inst Fourier (Grenoble) 56(1): 121-130, 2006) and Obro (Manuscr Math 125(1): 69-79, 2008). Smooth Fano polytopes play a role in algebraic geometry and mathematical physics.
paper_title: Smooth Fano Polytopes with Many Vertices
